name: UnofficialPokemonWeaknesses
0:
”Alexa, ask Pokemon Weaknesses, What are the weaknesses of fire type Pokemon?”
”Alexa, ask Pokemon Weaknesses what is strong against ground types?”
”Alexa, ask Pokemon Weaknesses what are water pokemon weak to?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pokemon weaknesses
des:
Find out quickly what specific Pokemon types are weak to!

Not affiliate with Nintendo, Game Freak, or the Pokemon Company.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
